title: 11/29 Fantasy Football Podcast: Who to Trust This Week & Beyond; WAS-DAL
description:
Get ready for a bold prediction! Adam starts the show with a Week 13 guarantee (2:00) before we recap what we noticed in Waiver Wire transactions in our leagues (3:09) ... All the latest news including Devonta Freeman's status (7:25), the Giants' QB decision (8:35) and important OL updates for the Thursday night game (14:10) ... A new game called "Are They Top 5?" (17:40) followed by our WAS-DAL preview (35:55), playoff stashes (44:31) and the Trustometer (49:16) for players like Leonard Fournette, Matthew Stafford, Marqise Lee and more ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
